title: WOWBUTTER, Much More Than a PB Replacement! Get Your FREE Sample Here
author: WOWBUTTER
description: Delicious and free of gluten and eight top allergens!
cleaned_text: No Nuts, No Compromise, and 'Safe for School' Whether you're a parent seeking a peanut-free peanut butter alternative that keeps your child safe, happy, and nourished, or someone on an elimination diet free of gluten, dairy, eggs, shellfish, or sesame, WOWBUTTER is the healthy alternative you've been looking for. |The #1 Rated Complete Plant Protein by PDCAAS quality score| |Naturally occurring highly beneficial Omega 3 simple, clean, all-natural Non-GMO ingredients| |RSPO (Roundtable on Sustainable Palm Oil) certified, ensuring our commitment to environmentally and socially responsible palm oil production.| |The Safe-for-School support with included Lunch identification stickers, providing peace of mind to school and daycare officials.| |WOWBUTTER is made in a dedicated 100% Peanut Free & Tree Nut Free Facility| Try WOWBUTTER with a FREE sample Click the appropriate button below and we'll send you a free sample of WOWBUTTER to try for yourself: Many ways to enjoy WOWBUTTER Savor our WOWBUTTER in Creamy or Crunchy on a crisp apple, spread thick on whole grain crackers, or whipped into a dreamy smoothie. Of course, nothing hits the spot quite like a WOWBUTTER and jelly sandwich! WOWBUTTER is a great addition to any recipe. Simply use 1:1 in place of PB in any recipe with the same great results. Visit [WOWBUTTER.com/recipes/](https://snacksafely.com/ad.php?code=WOW-20230824-03-P&src=sponsoredpost) for many more great recipe ideas.
